title: Rich people are flooding dollar stores as Americans navigate a crushing affordability crisis
description: Dollar Tree says 60% of new customers in its most recent quarter earned $100,000 or more.
content: Something unusual is happening at Dollar Tree: The discount retailer said this week that of the 3 million new households that shopped its stores in the third quarter, approximately 60% of those new c… [+3075 chars]
